subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dominik Hasek made 27 saves for his 73rd N.H.L. shutout, and Dan Cleary scored twice to lift the Detroit Red Wings to a 5-0 victory over the Columbus Blue Jackets on Wednesday night.
snippet: Dominik Hasek made 27 saves for his 73rd N.H.L. shutout, and Dan Cleary scored twice to lift the Detroit Red Wings to a 5-0 victory over the Columbus Blue Jackets on Wednesday night.
